A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The good:
Fantastic looking\, some great space fights. Ben and Rey give great performances. I also really like the code breaker.  

The bad:
Too many discontinued plot lines. 

They wasted snoke\, he could have been a much richer character with some sort of history or future impact\, but he was just a plot device for Ben to rise to the dark side. . . the old emperor had a rich story arch\, along side everyone else. No one in this movie has a character arch 

Rey is an insta-jedi\, no training required she's just magic. 

The stand in general for Laya was pointlessly elusive with a crap plan. They could have sent the medical support ships into the Republic fleet at light speed.  Or the Republic fleet could have done something similar.  The writing on this left so many gaping plot holes\, I'm amazed it wasn't stopped in pre-production.
